name: No One Left
description: The technology involved in this game is Lighting Effect in Dark Environments affecting Interactive Gameplay. The game is designed from a psychological aspect. The player needs to search for a way out while avoiding all the infected in the game with a limited vision in a dark environment. While exploring the area, the player can interact with the surrounding environment to perceive more of the situation to get subtle tips on acquiring basic understanding of the locations and search for keys to escape. The game is developed by using Game Development Life Cycle (GDLC). The outcome of the game is to achieve the immersive yet thrilling experience of a horror game on a relatable level.
